title: Crossroads
description: â€œAfter their flights to New York City are canceled in the midst of a pandemic, two strangers, Kaylee and Lauren, decide to find their own way home. Their feelings for each other developed along the back roads of Route 18, but Kaylee is stuck at a crossroads. Does she open herself up to the budding romance with a woman who constantly reminds her of her worth, or let her walls stand strong to protect her fragile and already broken heart?
author: Kathryn Demuro
